title: PS3 & Wii Turn 15: Remembering the Launches
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis, and Mark "I Don't Know What a Sequel Is" Medina -- are looking back on the launches of the PS3 and Nintendo Wii. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
content:encoded: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast!
